about_the_game:
Only Up: Chans Together — a unique cooperative platformer developed on Unreal Engine 5. The main characters are fragile yet determined anime girls, bound together by a chain and adorned with mysterious chastity belts. Your goal is to overcome numerous challenges with your friends and climb to the very top, where the key to freedom awaits!

Players must work as a team, as every move made by one character directly affects the other. Conquer dizzying platforms, avoid traps, and find ways to use the chain as a tool rather than a burden.

Backstory

In a distant, fantastical world where the skies connect to the earth through towering structures and hanging cities, mysterious forces enslave the souls of the defiant. The anime girls, protagonists of the game, have become victims of an ancient curse. They are bound by magical chastity belts that symbolize their imprisonment, and the chains linking them serve as a reminder that freedom can only be achieved through mutual effort.

Legend speaks of a key hidden at the peak of a magnificent tower, capable of breaking the chains and returning freedom to the heroines. But the path to the summit is fraught with danger: narrow bridges, crumbling stairways, floating platforms, and countless traps. Success requires working together, as every step of one hero influences the other.

Mechanics

  • Challenging Obstacles

    • A variety of platforms: moving, disappearing, and rotating.

    • Traps: spikes, falling objects, and zones with intensified gravity.

    • Physical puzzles: use the chain to activate mechanisms, swing across gaps, or help your partner climb over obstacles.

  • Cooperative Gameplay

    • The characters are connected by a chain, limiting their movement range.

    • Players must coordinate their actions to avoid falling.

    • One player can assist the other by tightening the chain or using it to save them.

  • Multiplayer Elements

    • Modes for 2, 4, or more players with team divisions.

    • Race against other pairs: who will reach the top fastest?

    • Leaderboards for the most successful players.

  • Character Customization

    • Choose unique looks for your heroine: hairstyles, hair colors, outfits, and accessories.

    • Unlock new customization elements as you progress.

  • Dynamic Difficulty

    • Each level gets harder: platforms become narrower, traps more dangerous, and gravity increasingly unstable.

    • Random events: earthquakes, gusts of wind, and other obstacles that require quick decisions.

  • Reward and Punishment System

    • Fell down? Return to the last safe zone.

    • Temporary bonuses: speed boosts, increased chain length, or brief invincibility.

name: Only Up: Chan Chained Together

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD R9 270X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Only Up: Chans Together is a game about challenges, strategic thinking, and true teamwork. Only those who are ready to trust their partner can reach the end and claim their freedom. Can you prove you're worthy of the key to the summit?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
